QuestData.Title: It's a Matter of Strategy
QuestData.Description:
**Eyes Only -- Commander $n**
The Iron Horde have proved themselves worthy foes.$B$BThey managed to get their fleet moving to Talador from Gorgrond without my spies seeing a thing. Talador be a crossroads for the whole continent. We can't let them have it.$B$BDon't worry boss, we got a plan. Foreman Grobash be setting up an outpost for our forces as we speak. They be ready for you when you arrive, commander.$b$b--Rokhan
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bron Skyhorn to secure a flight to Talador.
